description.value:
Your time gossiping in fashionable salons keeps you informed on every topic.

You are trained in Gossip Lore, a special Lore skill that can be used only to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge], but on any topic. If you fail a check to Recall Knowledge with Gossip Lore, you get the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Dubious Knowledge] skill feat.

If you have legendary proficiency in Society, you gain expert proficiency in Gossip Lore, but you can't increase your proficiency rank in Gossip Lore by any other means.
